C

checkDiagonalLeftRight(Mark, int) - Method in class model.Board
Checks whether the given Diagonal at field[i] from the top left to the bottom right of the Board connects four Marks m.
checkDiagonalRightLeft(Mark, int) - Method in class model.Board
Checks whether the given Diagonal at field[i] from the top right to the bottom left of the Board connects four Marks m.

Client class for the game Connect Four.

Creates a new Client.
clientDisconnected(String) - Method in class view.ServerView
Prints a nicer and more beautiful message when a client disconnects.

Class for handling communication with a Client.

clientShutDown() - Method in class controller.ClientHandler
